name: Ratti
description:
A game about insomnia, sleeping pills and loneliness.

Walk with the arrows, listen to music and fall into melancholy.
I hope you like it. I put my soul in that small demo.
I made art, music and code. But since I am not good at code - few very cool guys helped we with it, huge thanks to them!

It's in a very early development stage. I started to learn Construct 2 only 2 weeks ago, but I draw some locations and made music, so you can roam around and maybe you can suggest some ideas if you want to.

You can always drop me a message on twitter:
https://twitter.com/ElMetallico1
